name: Gathering Tools
description:
Check which character has the unlimited gathering tools equipped.
Show a reminder when pressing the logout key (default: F12) to not forget putting unlimited tools into shared inventory slots.
Make sure that the logout key in Guild Wars 2 matches the logout key in the settings of this module.

account.details: For searching gathering tools on characters
